name: Tales of Anubis - The Past is The Future
name_original: Tales of Anubis - The Past is The Future
description:
Evaluation Link: https://forms.gle/p7QFhU4xWhCBrjX97 

One day, a guy named Lancer, known as a famous photographer, went on a trip to Egypt to capture a beautiful monument. He decided to take some pictures from a different angle so he can get the perfect shot. Unexpectedly, he fell into a pitfall and lost consciousness. Then, he was shocked when he realized that he woke up in a cell. He is trapped and has to get out using weapons available to fight the enemies. What awaits in the lancer’s adventure will unfold.
